name: Pierre Payeur
content: Pierre Payeur Home Page P Dr. Pierre Payeur ing., Ph.D. Professor / Professeur Titulaire School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Director: Sensing and Machine Vision for Automation and Robotic Intelligence Research Laboratory Founding member: Vision, Imaging, Video and Autonomous Systems Research Laboratory Sensing and Machine Vision for Automation and Robotic Intelligence Research Interests: Machine Vision and Image Processing 3D Sensing and Modeling Human Motion Capture and Gesture Analysis Tactile Sensing and Dexterous Robotic Manipulation Robots Navigation Automation and Intelligent Manufacturing Artificial and Computational Intelligence Publications Graduate Students Teaching: CEG 4158 - Computer Control in Robotics (F'2000 - F'2020) CEG 4558 - Commande par Ordinateur en Robotique (A'1999 - A'2013, A'2017 - A'2020) ELG 5163 - Machine Vision (W'2002 - W'2006, W'2009 - W'2011, F'2013, W'2018 - W'2019, W'2021) Others... P Pierre Payeur School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science University of Ottawa 800 King Edward, room 5066 Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1N 6N5 Tel: (613) 562-5800 x 6717, Fax: (613) 562-5664 Email: ppayeur@uottawa.ca
